channel.title: 2006redone.org - Alpha stage - need testers
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=3]This server is currently still under development[/size] Also i have permission from Extremez or something to take over the project, Andrew quit developing it because he was bored.
[url=http://2006redone.org][img]http://i.imgur.com/lK1VF.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://twitter.com/2006Redone]Visit our Twitter[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/2006redone]Visit our Youtube Channel[/url] [url=http://2006redone.org]Visit our website[/url]
2006redone is a remake of the years of 2006. 2006redone will help you relive your childhood memories and get away from the terrible new content jagex has put in place of that.
[u][b]The Team[/b][/u]: Owner and Website developer: Dondxon Secondary Website developer: [B]Empty[/B] Server developers: [B]LOOKING FOR DEVELOPERS[/B]
[b][u]Progress[/u][/b]:
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[b][u]Client Features[/u][/b]:
- Fast client - Autocache downloader - 377 Maps - 377 Items - 377 Anims/Gfx - 377 Gameframe - 377 Npcs - No customs
[b][u]Website Features[/u][/b]:
In the post down below
[b][u]Server Features[/u][/b]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Rock Golem
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b][u]Fishing[/u][/b]: - All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations
[u][b]Skills to do[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img]-Farming [img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img]-Slayer
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning
[img]http://www.runerebels.com/images/kevin/sprites/headicons_pk%200.png[/img] [u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]:
-TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken -Random Event Handling System -No random in tut island, in certain areas, etc...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]:
-Cook's Assistant, Doric's Quest, Imp Catchter, Pirates treasure, Restless Ghost, Rune Mysteries, Sheep Shearer, Vampyre Slayer, Witch's Potion, Gertrudes Cat -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)
[b][u]Membership[/u][/b]:
- Member only worlds in the future - One time fee $ 10. - Members get 352 bank slots while non members get 100 - Members can reset any combat stat that is 10 and under - Members get to attend any testing phase that is open before the server starts - Members get a donator only forum section - Members Simple BBcode such as Bold, Italics, and Underline.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]:
- Random event handler that works great with all random events - Skill handler that works great with all skills - Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 10 random events in place as of now - All skills done to full completion - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - 2500 + npcs spawned - Changelog with almost 400 changes now - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap). - Runescape guilds - All food that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - All runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets loaed - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Tele other - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed - Update Cache - Members Only Benefits - Runescape prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - Same exp rates as runescape (May be changed if voted for). - Weapon Poisoning - Music/Sounds
[b][u]Applications are still being accepted[/u][/b]:
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/requests/463670-2006redone-server-developers-needed.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/requests/463670-2006redone-server-developers-needed.html[/url] [/center]
[center][B]Some server pictures:[/B]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33axf6a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/33a4eg5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/21lu6ia.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/339jdz8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2eoictu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/28anf6g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/a10hew.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/16qn3c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dbsk80.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/282m2km.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2zxweue.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/thief.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/internf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/quests.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/sail1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/sail2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/sail3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/teleport.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/report1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/report2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/bananas.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/whip.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/dscim.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/dlong.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/dmace.png[/img] [IMG]http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac263/juultjek50/dds.png[/img][/center]
[B]Credits:[/B] - I Am Boss (Andrew) for almost 95% - Dondxon and Joshua F - Integration - Sanity - the base - Graham - Ryan - Blake
If i forgot anyone, let me know it.

item.title: 2006redone.org - Alpha stage - need testers
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The Membership benefits are actually thought out and balanced. Good job on these. Just a warning though, if you charge people like this, Jagex will go apeshit.

item.title: 2006redone.org - Alpha stage - need testers
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=3]This server is currently still under development[/size]
Also i have permission from Extremez or something to take over the project, Andrew quit developing it because he was bored.

Visit our Twitter
Visit our Youtube Channel
Visit our website

2006redone is a remake of the years of 2006. 2006redone will help you relive your childhood memories and get away from the terrible new content jagex has put in place of that.

The Team:
Owner and Website developer: Dondxon
Secondary Website developer: Empty
Server developers: LOOKING FOR DEVELOPERS

Progress:

The red color means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color means the feature has been finished.

Client Features:

  • Fast client
  • Autocache downloader
  • 377 Maps
  • 377 Items
  • 377 Anims/Gfx
  • 377 Gameframe
  • 377 Npcs
  • No customs

Website Features:

In the post down below

Server Features:

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random

Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level

Firemaking:

  • Correct anims
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them

Woodcutting:

  • Stumps and regrowing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fell chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree
  • Canoes

Mining:

  • Emptying and refilling rocks
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems
  • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
  • Mining gems at shilo village
  • Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
  • Rock Golem

Fletching:

  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

Crafting:

  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewelry Molding

Thieving:

  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Times

Cooking:

  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine

Runecrafting:

  • Altar Enterting
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • All potions makeable
  • Itentifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Smithing:

  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Correct anims, working interfaces & objects

Fishing:

  • All fish can be caught
  • Big net fishing
  • Correct item requirements
  • Fishing spots located all around the world
  • Correct animations

Skills to do:

-Farming
-Slayer

Combat:

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Degradable equipment
  • Weapon poisoning

Bosses:

-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagganoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagganoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon

Minigames:

-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Fight Caves
-Barrows
-Fight Pits
-Pest Control

Random Events:

-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
-Rock Golem
-Spirit Tree
-Zombie
-Evil Chicken
-Random Event Handling System
-No random in tut island, in certain areas, etc…

Quests:

-Cook’s Assistant, Doric’s Quest, Imp Catchter, Pirates treasure, Restless Ghost, Rune Mysteries, Sheep Shearer, Vampyre Slayer, Witch’s Potion, Gertrudes Cat
-Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)

Membership:

  • Member only worlds in the future
  • One time fee $ 10.
  • Members get 352 bank slots while non members get 100
  • Members can reset any combat stat that is 10 and under
  • Members get to attend any testing phase that is open before the server starts
  • Members get a donator only forum section
  • Members Simple BBcode such as Bold, Italics, and Underline.

Miscellaneous:

  • Random event handler that works great with all random events
  • Skill handler that works great with all skills
  • Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests
  • Around 10 random events in place as of now
  • All skills done to full completion
  • Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)
  • Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)
  • Skill interfaces
  • Pets
  • Working objects all around the world
  • 2500 + npcs spawned
  • Changelog with almost 400 changes now
  • Christmas Crackers
  • Holiday events handler
  • Working desert
  • Single and double doors
  • Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).
  • Runescape guilds
  • All food that runescape had in 2006
  • Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only
  • All runescapes shops that were in 2006
  • All runescapes potions
  • Correct runescape start
  • Sailing
  • Gnome Glider
  • Bank Pins
  • Correct runescape teleports
  • Wilderness warning
  • All rings/amulets loaed
  • Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req
  • Tele tabs
  • Tele other
  • Lots of minigames
  • Clipping following/npcs
  • Empty handler added for items that can be emptied
  • Crystal Chest
  • Flour Mill
  • Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed
  • Update Cache
  • Members Only Benefits
  • Runescape prices
  • Chat filtering
  • Running/w energy
  • Magic Carpet
  • Skill Guides
  • Same exp rates as runescape (May be changed if voted for).
  • Weapon Poisoning
  • Music/Sounds

Applications are still being accepted:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/requests/463670-2006redone-server-developers-needed.html
[/center]

[/center]

Credits:

  • I Am Boss (Andrew) for almost 95%
  • Dondxon and Joshua F - Integration
  • Sanity - the base
  • Graham
  • Ryan
  • Blake

If i forgot anyone, let me know it.

Read full topic
